channel.title: Magebank – The Legendary Server
channel.description:
[CENTER][font=arial]Magebank – The Legendary Server[/font] Formerly known as Hackscape[/center]
[center][URL=http://"http://magebank.org/playnow.php"]Play Now[/URL] [URL=http://"http://magebank.org/forums/"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://magebank.org/downloads/"]Download[/URL][/center]
[pre]Server is in double EXP month! Double PkPoints in Edgeville!
Magebank has been online since 2007 and so is ran by an experienced owner and played by a loyal base. The server can remain online for weeks at a time ran on a dedicated server with DDOS protection.
All skills are fully working with exp rates that provide a sense of achievement without wasting too much of your time.
Highscores, Vote for points and an auto-donation system!
600+ Items including Torva, Virtus, Pernix, Vesta and MORE[/pre]
[center]PvP: - Earning Potential - Enhanced combat system - Perfect switching - Pk points system that is unboostable - Pk point shop full of high level equipment
PvM: - Classic bosses such as KBD, Chaos elemental, Dagannoth Kings and Kalphite Queen - Corporal Beast - Bork - Barrelchest - God wars - Tormented Demons All of which with a range of drops including nex equipment.
Minigames: - Barrows - Fight Caves - Fight Pits - Duel arena with full staking - Assault Mini[/center]
[center] PVP! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BjAjHTh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hjcYeZD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hNqKeg3.png[/img]
WildyWyrms! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1rIptf8.png[/img][/center]

[pre]Server is in double EXP month!
Double PkPoints in Edgeville!

Magebank has been online since 2007 and so is ran by an experienced owner and played by a loyal base. The server can remain online for weeks at a time ran on a dedicated server with DDOS protection.

All skills are fully working with exp rates that provide a sense of achievement without wasting too much of your time.

Highscores, Vote for points and an auto-donation system!

600+ Items including Torva, Virtus, Pernix, Vesta and MORE[/pre]

[center]PvP:

  • Earning Potential

    All of which with a range of drops including nex equipment.
